index.description: interactive sketches made with three.js. created by yoichi kobayashi.

water.title: water
water.description: Distort the scene with the water surface normal map.

glass.title: glass
glass.description: I made an object that has refraction of light like glass. It's distorting the frame buffer of the landscape with normals.

fire_ball_2.title: fire ball 2
fire_ball_2.description: Learning how to use SkinnedMesh, Skeleton, and Bone by creating a fireball tail.

flow_field_5.title: flow field 5
flow_field_5.description: A bundle of light moved by the gravitational pull of the core and the force of the flow field.

flow_field_4.title: flow field 4
flow_field_4.description: Particles that have a trail. It consists of two Instanced Meshes.

flow_field_3.title: flow field 3
flow_field_3.description: made the codes with Geometry Instancing, and move these with GPGPU and Hooke's law.

flow_field_2.title: flow field 2
flow_field_2.description: made the cones with Geometry Instancing, and move these with GPGPU and simple physics calculation.

flow_field.title: flow field
flow_field.description: the simple 3D flow field made with a noise texture and GPGPU.

skull.title: skull
skull.description: It's ONIBI. I made it with only a noise texture and a skull head model.

aura.title: aura
aura.description: Drawing the aura along the outline of any meshes.

shadow.title: shadow
shadow.description: I never tried primary Depth Buffer Shadow, but I tried it finally.

splash.title: splash
splash.description: Move the particles with only the texture so that they look like splashes.

burn.title: burn
burn.description: made an image transition function with an effect seems like a paper is burning.

crystal.title: crystal
crystal.description: make the crystal that has the aura inside of self.

node.title: node
node.description: It is the first step of Interactive Coding.

sun.title: sun
sun.description: Creating the sun using some textures. It isn't depending on the Noise calculation.

easyGlitch.title: easy glitch
easyGlitch.description: It attaches a simple glitch effect with only using a noise image and adjusting texCoord.

dissolve.title: dissolve
dissolve.description: It attaches the dissolve effect made with Noise calculation and UV animation to the simple slideshow.

dna.title: dna
dna.description: drawing DNA Helix with particles only.

newyear2019.title: New Year 2019
newyear2019.description: I hope you will have a great year!

buddha.title: buddha
buddha.description: It's the study to draw metallic color and to attach Godray effect.

planet.title: planet
planet.description: generate a planet object with simplex noise.

land.title: land
land.description: generate a landscape object with simplex noise.

webcam.title: webcam
webcam.description: Make a video texture in WebGL with an image from a webcam, and process it using the face tracking and calculating acceleration.

fog.title: fog
fog.description: make fog with one texture and Geometry instancing.

nodeText.title: node text
nodeText.description: transform the node that is made with Points and Wireframe

repel.title: repel
repel.description: Convert the mousemove position to the 3d scene position.

flame.title: flame
flame.description: draw a flame with the Simplex Noise and a cylinder geometry.

cyberspace.title: cyberspace
cyberspace.description: cyberspace made with various simple objects.

beam.title: beam
beam.description: beam effect made with uv animation.

transform.title: transform
transform.description: transform 3d object from butterfly to image with easing function.

egg.title: egg
egg.description: drawing inside of egg with only fragment shader.

butterfly.title: butterfly
butterfly.description: express butterfly flapping with plane geometry and trigonometric function.

puddle.title: puddle
puddle.description: drawing puddle with fragment shader only.

reel.title: reel
reel.description: pick instance objects and add hover effects.

particle.title: particle
particle.description: random walk with Classic noise functions.

hole.title: hole
hole.description: study of Post Effect with THREE.WebGLRenderTarget.

distort.title: distort
distort.description: distort the sphere with simplex noise.

gallery.title: gallery
gallery.description: image gallery on 3d. tested that picked object and moving camera.

comet.title: comet
comet.description: camera to track the moving points.

hyperSpace.title: hyper space
hyperSpace.description: add little change about camera angle and particle controles.

fireBall.title: fire ball
fireBall.description: test of simple physics and additive blending.
